snippet: Five others were injured at a prison in central Oklahoma where a fight in June had also led to injuries.
abstract: Oklahoma prison on second lockdown since June after fight between inmates kills three and injures five; prison staff did not cause fatalities or sustain injuries.
lead_paragraph: Five others were injured at a prison in central Oklahoma where a fight in June had also led to injuries.

headline.main: Three Inmates Killed as Violence Breaks Out at Oklahoma Prison
headline.print_headline: Three Inmates Killed as Violence Breaks Out at Oklahoma Prison
